p: We collected a dataset of 121,729 unique print articles, online articles, and blog posts on CC from 01 January 2000 to 01 October 2016 from 7126 unique media sources from the MC project, an open data project hosted by the MIT Center for Civic Media and the Berkman Klein Center for Internet & Society at Harvard University ( https://cyber.harvard.edu/research/mediacloud). See Supplementary NoteÂ 2 for additional details on the data collection.
